name: Ammonium benzoicum
Relationship: In albuminuria compare: Kalmia; Helon; Merc. cor.; Berb.; Canth.Compare: Terebinth.; Benz-ac.; Ammonia salts, Caust.

Head: Heavy, stupid
Back: Pain across sacrum, with urgency to stool
Soreness in region of right kidney

details: One of the remedies for albuminuria, especially in the gouty. Gout, with deposits in joints. Urinary incontinence in the aged.
